titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: Systemic Anti-cancer Therapy Drug Administration - Description

div.p: A Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration is a CLINICAL INTERVENTION.

A Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration is the giving of a therapeutic agent to a PATIENT, for example, infusion, inhalation, injection, paste, suppository or tablet during Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy.
